definition[0]: subdued lighting, colours etc are less bright than usual
definition[1]: a person that is subdued is unusually quiet and possibly unhappy
example[2]: ‘Oh, ’ she said in a subdued voice.
definition[2]: an activity that is subdued does not have as much excitement as you would expect
example[3]: The housing market is fairly subdued.
definition[3]: a sound that is subdued is quieter than usual
